caption.p: Classification of commonly differentially expressed genes in the three AVM nidus samples

tr.td: MGP, SERPINE1, COL1A1, SPP1, MAFB, SERPINA3, COL3A1, CYR61

td.bold: Genes related to inflammation and immune response

tr.td: CD163, CXCR4, CHI3L1/L2, IFI30, LIF, CD69, OSM, C7, HLADRB5, C1R, CTSS, HLA-DQA1, HLA-DQA2, TLR2, LTF
